short_summary: Education Coordinator - Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services Campbell River Area
full_summary:
#### [Education Coordinator - Stream to Sea Program Delivery and Coordination Services Campbell River Area]

#### Solicitation #: 30003164-1
**Document ID:** PW-22-01011939
**Tender Status:** Expired
**Tender Closing Date:** November 21, 2022
**Publication Date:** November 7, 2022

**Background**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a contractor to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea Program in the Campbell River area. The program aims to engage students from Kindergarten to Grade 12, First Nations, local communities, and external parties in cooperative fisheries and watershed stewardship activities.

**Services Required**: 

* Delivery and coordination of the Stream to Sea Program in the Campbell River area (Comox Valley, Campbell River, and Francophone Campbell River)
* Support and maintenance of the DFO classroom incubation program (Salmonids in the Classroom)
* In-service training for teacher groups on Fisheries and Oceans Educational resources (Curriculum/Activity In-services)
* Coordination of youth groups in marking storm drains (Storm Drain Marking Program)
* Participation in the Fisheries and Oceans South Coast Area Education Team (SCA Education Team)

**Period of Contract**: December 1, 2022, to July 31, 2023. Optional two one-year extensions to be exercised at the discretion of DFO.

**Security Requirement**: None

**Trade Agreements**: None

**Solicitation Information**:
* Solicitation #30003164-1 (Expired)
* Publication Date: November 7, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 21, 2022

**Contact Information**:
* Clara Ventura (Contract Officer)
* Email: DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* Phone Number: 613-203-4981
